## AddComponentElementConfig interface

Controls whether to add wrapper elements for components

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface AddComponentElementConfig 
```

## Remarks

Default value: `false`

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [compilerOnly](./react-rsbuild-plugin.addcomponentelementconfig.compileronly.md) |  | boolean | Whether to only add component element during compilation |
